value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|A festival? To celebrate spring?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, yes. Everyone dresses up like
bunny rabbits! Let's go together,
darling? What do you say?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|No.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, too bad. I was so looking forward
to seeing you in costume...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|I'm not interested. Besides, my
brother is coming back soon, and
I need to prepare his tea.$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Coming back? But Bruno has
plans to attend the festival!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|He... What?$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|I've heard that there's a clue there...
Something he's looking for.$k$pDon't you think you'd better go and
help him out? Hmm?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|*sigh*$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|It's here, is it?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Brother... You intend to participate
in this festival?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|Yes. Loki...well, she told me there's
something I can obtain only here...
Something I need.$k$pIf there's even a chance that her
words are true, I must don this garb
and seek it.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|If you say so, I believe you.$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_SpringFes19,Face|You two make an adorable pair.$k$pWhat a lovely festival we'll have this
year. Don't you think?$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|I get the feeling we're being tricked.$k$p
$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_春祭ブルーノ,ch00_05_Bruno_M_SpringFes19,Face|I must keep searching... Until I find it!$k$p$WmMPID_春祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_SpringFes19,Face|Of course, Bruno.$k$p$Sbs150|
